about-us.title: About Us
about-us.text: International School with UK Curriculum, Both Cambridge and Edexcel Primary, Secondary and Advanced Level, IGCSE O Level, A Level.

additional-information.title: Additional Information
additional-information.text: This institute standout academic programs for IGCSE & A level students mainly on UK Curriculum. We promote the learning activities of every student and provide strong academic fundamentals built on a foundation of character education to leverage their university progression.

history.title: History
history.text: The Institute of International Professionalism was established in 2016 as a school offering the IGCSE curriculum to students seeking an internationally recognized qualification. Over the years, the school has grown and expanded its offerings to provide a wider range of educational opportunities. Today, the Institute of International Professionalism provides not only IGCSE courses but also A-Levels and Year-1 to 9 classes. With its commitment to academic excellence, the school has earned a reputation for providing high-quality education that prepares students for success in their future academic and professional endeavors.
